description: Complete system overview documenting the core functionality of therapist profile management, data import/export systems, and profile scraping architecture
Detailed documentation of the SQLite database schema, including therapist, directory, profile, and junction table structures, along with their relationships and constraints
Comprehensive documentation of data import/export processes, including CSV import/export logic, Google Form data integration, and staff data import mechanisms
Detailed documentation of profile scraping algorithms for different directory sites, including data extraction patterns, comparison logic, and error handling strategies
Documentation of data flow between components, including how data moves between importers, database, scrapers, and comparison functions
